entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:04 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
